title: Asking for the bill after the meal

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Would you like the check now or would you like to order dessert first?
turns.user_response_option_en: I'll just take the check now, thank you.
turns.ai_conversation_starter_ko: 지금 계산을 하시겠습니까, 아니면 디저트를 먼저 주문하시겠습니까?
